Work

EXPERIENCE AND PROJECTS

Projects

Task Tracker

Project created to learn about React framework. The application implements hooks, routing, and a mock back-end with JSON Server. Emphasis was placed on keeping it as a single-page application (no refreshes occur throughout usage of the app).

GITHUB SITE LINK
D Con-4 Online Program Website

Website created using HTML, Sass, and JavaScript. Node-sass used to compile Sass to a single CSS file. Bootstrap used for some page formatting, but mostly done using HTML/CSS. Also incorporates UI/UX design fundamentals.

GITHUB SITE LINK
Movie Database

Project created to practice API calls using ajax function in JavaScript and parsing JSON. Landing page displays now playing movies and search bar will search for all movies with the key word. Project also focused on being responsive by using Bootstrap.

GITHUB SITE LINK
MERN Stack E-Commerce App

Project made to learn about the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) and increase practice with the React framework. The project is still in production and is being done by learning from Brad Traversy on Udemy.

GITHUB SITE LINK
Mock Company Website

Website created using simple HTML/CSS, as well as implementing Bootstrap. Project built familiarity with Bootstrap components like Navbar, Cards, and more.

GITHUB SITE LINK
Portfolio

Website created with D Con-4 project as skeleten (therefore also using HTML, Sass, and JavaScript as well as using Node-sass to compile Sass to CSS). Includes implementation of GSAP for animation.

GITHUB SITE LINK
Quitas and Moris

A concept dance film about two beings that live vicariously through one another. Full story explained in YouTube bio.

Roles: Artistic Director, Choreographer, Performer, Video Editor

A dance set about struggling with self image, confidence, and finding yourself.

re.direct Music App Design

Full design and mockups created for DesignLab Design 101 course. Included creation of wireframes, logo iterations, and more. Designs created using Sketch.

D Con-4 Volume 2 Rebranding Posters

Design created for rebranding of D Con-4 Online program. Design was for Instagram posters that would subtly hint at an Avatar theme for the second round of the program. Posters created using Sketch.

D Con-4 Initial Branding

Initial branding designs created for logo, title, website calendar, and posters (for member spotlights). Designs created using Sketch.

Personal Site Website/Logo Design

Portfolio website design and logo creation with emphasis on font and color choices.
